Question & Options:
Which of the following statements is true regarding Freddie Mercury and his associations?
Options:
A. Paul Prenter managed Freddie Mercury's daily schedule.
B. Freddie Mercury was originally named Farrokh.
C. Freddie Mercury was a member of the band Queen.
D. All of the above

Which of the following statements is true regarding Ray and EMI in relation to Queen?
Options:
A. a) Ray Foster was an executive at EMI.
B. b) Ray left Queen when they quit EMI.
C. c) Ray Foster refused to release 'Bohemian Rhapsody' as the lead single.
D. d) EMI was instrumental in the success of Queen.
Correct Answer: a) Ray Foster was an executive at EMI., b) Ray left Queen when they quit EMI., c) Ray Foster refused to release 'Bohemian Rhapsody' as the lead single.
